original: Saraṇaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: araṇam a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā araṇam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ

original: naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
